description: This file defines a SearchFragment class for an Android TV application. It provides search functionality for recipes, displaying results in a grid, and handles user interactions such as clicking on recipe items to navigate to a details page.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A fragment for searching recipes, displaying search results in a grid, and handling item click events.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the search fragment, sets up the adapter, and click listener.

methods.name: getResultsAdapter
methods.description: Returns the adapter used for displaying search results.

methods.name: onQueryTextChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the search query text, triggers loading new results.

methods.name: onQueryTextSubmit
methods.description: Handles search query submission, triggers loading of results.

methods.name: loadQuery
methods.description: Performs filtering of recipes based on the query and updates the display.
